names.english: invigorate the blood and break up stasis
names.commonEnglish: Invigorate the Blood and Break up Stasis

actions: Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and relieves pain.
Invigorates the Blood and promotes the movement of Qi.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, opens the channels and alleviates pain.
With Chuan Xiong, for chest and abdominal pain due to Qi and Blood Stasis.
Invigorates nourishes and cools the Blood and dispels Blood Stasis.
Invigorates the Blood and expels Blood Stasis.
Sedates the Heart, settles tremors and palpitations and clears the Liver.
Clears Liver Fire, clears Hot Phlegm and treats hypertension.

symptoms: Abdominal pain that is worse with pressure
manifestations.tongue: Dark purple or with echymoses or petechiae or pale with purplish spots
manifestations.pulse: Choppy or Tense and deep and slow
